SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsoleColors
Defines the escape codes for outputting colors to the console, Color names used by web interface to define html colors
GameStatus
Data Class for game status Three data elements: gameOver - true or false userWon - true or false secretWord - string with the word selected from the dictionary
GuessEvaluation
Evaluates the users guess against the secret word (selected from the dictionary).
GuessEvaluation.Result
Enum defining the valid colors for guess evaluation
GuessResponse
 
GuessResult
Data Class for processing user guesses Defines an ENUM for guess status = VALID or INVALID Three data elements: guessStatus - VALID or INVALID guessEvaluation - array of Result enums denoting color of each character in guess
GuessResult.GuessStatus
 
GuessValidation
GuessValidation Class Codes validation rules including length (exactly 5 characters), allowable characters (a-z and A-Z) Normalizes the guess (removes leading and trailing white space), shifts all characters to UPPERCASE WORD_LENGTH - defines the length for guesses and secret words
Main
 
WordleController
 
WordleDictionary
Configures and populates the dictionary of valid Wordle solutions.

WordleUI
